players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I believe we should focus our suspicions on the player who was investigated last night. It's unusual for a detective to investigate someone and then not share their findings."
Charlie: "I agree with Alice's suggestion. It is indeed unusual for a detective to keep their investigation results private. Let's give Diana some thought before we vote today."

Diana: "I understand Alice and Charlie's concerns, but I have been focused on my own investigations and haven't had the chance to share my findings yet. Let's give each other a chance to speak before we jump to conclusions."

Charlie: "I believe it's important that we all share our investigations and findings openly to promote transparency and trust in the village. While I did investigate someone last night, I want to assure everyone that my intentions are pure and I have not aligned myself with the maf..."
You: "I have no reason to suspect Diana at this moment, and I believe it's important for us to keep an open mind. Let's continue our investigations and share our findings openly."

Votes: Alice voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Charlie voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Diana voted for Alice (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
